subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Ms. Gerry bred and owned the three-time Horse of the Year Forego and was the first woman to be honored as an Exemplar of Racing by the Hall of Fame.
snippet: Ms. Gerry bred and owned the three-time Horse of the Year Forego and was the first woman to be honored as an Exemplar of Racing by the Hall of Fame.
